column4: Hi I just installed kubuntu on my laptop and is trying to configure my ATI Radeon 9700 Mobility card, i found this page http://www.student.dtu.dk/~s971652/ati_radeon.shtml but unfortunatly it doesn't work, fglrx module is loaded and i have changed my xorg.conf file but i still get the Mesa info if i type fglrxinfo
it says it can't set the AGP mode
